trans-unit.source: Provides a common interface and functionality for classes to add SOAP extension information to a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> object on a per-method basis.
trans-unit.target: Gir en vanlig grensesnittet og funksjoner for klasser å legge til SOAP-utvidelsen informasjon til en <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref> objektet på per metoden basis.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.SoapExtensionReflector"></xref> class
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.SoapExtensionReflector"> </xref> klassen

trans-unit.source: Generates service-specific description information that gets placed in a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> object corresponding to a binding.
trans-unit.target: Genererer tjenestespesifikk beskrivelsesinformasjon som henter er plassert i en <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref> objektet tilsvarer en binding.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the instance of a class derived from the abstract <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ProtocolReflector"></xref> class that invokes the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapExtensionReflector.ReflectMethod*> method.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir forekomst av en klasse som er avledet av abstrakt <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ProtocolReflector"> </xref> klasse som aktiverer den <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapExtensionReflector.ReflectMethod*>metoden.</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapExtensionReflector.ReflectMethod*>

trans-unit.source: If you implement a class that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapExtensionReflector>`abstract` class, you do not need to implement a class that is derived from <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ProtocolReflector> to invoke the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapExtensionReflector.ReflectMethod%2A> method or to set the ReflectionContext property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du implementere en klasse som er avledet av <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapExtensionReflector> `abstract` klasse, trenger du ikke å implementere en klasse som er avledet fra <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ProtocolReflector>å aktivere den <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapExtensionReflector.ReflectMethod%2A>metoden eller angi egenskapen ReflectionContext.</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapExtensionReflector.ReflectMethod%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ProtocolReflector></xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapExtensionReflector>

trans-unit.source: The instance of a class derived from the abstract <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ProtocolReflector"></xref> class that invokes the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapExtensionReflector.ReflectMethod*> method.
trans-unit.target: Forekomst av en klasse som er avledet fra abstract <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ProtocolReflector"> </xref> klasse som aktiverer den <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapExtensionReflector.ReflectMethod*>metoden.</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapExtensionReflector.ReflectMethod*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Abstract" name="Abstract" href=""></xref> method that a derived class must implement to add SOAP extension information to a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> object on a per-method basis.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Abstract" name="Abstract" href=""></xref>metode som en avledet klasse må implementere for å legge til SOAP-utvidelsen informasjon til en <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref> objektet på per metoden basis.

trans-unit.source: TheReflectMethodmethod is called for each Web method that belongs to a binding that the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription>represents.
trans-unit.target: TheReflectMethodmethod kalles for hver Web-metoden som tilhører en binding som den <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription>representerer.</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription>

trans-unit.source: The ReflectMethod method does not use the Web method directly.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ReflectMethod Bruk ikke Web-metoden direkte.

trans-unit.source: The SOAP extension information gets added for all Web methods in a binding reflected from a Web service class.
trans-unit.target: Henter legges SOAP utvidelsen informasjonen for alle Web-metoder i en binding reflektert fra en tjeneste-klasse.

trans-unit.source: An implementation of the ReflectMethod can generate information like operation binding, `abstract` operation, and messages.
trans-unit.target: Implementering av ReflectMethod kan generere informasjon som operasjonen bindingen `abstract` operasjonen, og meldinger.
